trans-unit.source: Specifies <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer" /> settings.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer" /> 設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializerSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializerSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a surrogate type that is currently active for given IDataContractSurrogate instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Surrogate 型別，其為指定之 IDataContractSurrogate 執行個體目前使用中的型別。

trans-unit.source: The surrogate type that is currently active for given IDataContractSurrogate instance.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 IDataContractSurrogate 執行個體的目前使用中的 Surrogate 型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a DateTimeFormat that defines the culturally appropriate format of displaying dates and times.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 DateTimeFormat，定義日期和時間在文化特性上適當的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: The DateTimeFormat that defines the culturally appropriate format of displaying dates and times.
trans-unit.target: DateTimeFormat，可定義日期和時間在文化特性上適當的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data contract JSON serializer settings to emit type information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要發出型別資訊的資料合約 JSON 序列化程式設定。

trans-unit.source: The data contract JSON serializer settings to emit type information.
trans-unit.target: 要發出型別資訊的資料合約 JSON 序列化程式設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ignore data supplied by an extension of the class when the class is being serialized or deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定當類別序列化或還原序列化時，是否略過類別延伸所提供的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to ignore data supplied by an extension of the class when the class is being serialized or deserialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 表示當類別序列化或還原序列化時，是否略過類別延伸所提供的資料，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of types that may be present in the object graph serialized using this instance the DataContractJsonSerializerSettings.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定型別的集合，這些型別可能會存在於使用這個 DataContractJsonSerializerSettings 執行個體所序列化的物件圖形中。

trans-unit.source: A collection of types that may be present in the object graph serialized using this instance the DataContractJsonSerializerSettings.
trans-unit.target: 型別的集合，這些型別可能會存在於使用這個 DataContractJsonSerializerSettings 執行個體所序列化的物件圖形中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in an object graph to serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件圖形中要序列化或還原序列化的最大項目數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items in an object graph to serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: 物件圖形中要序列化或還原序列化的最大項目數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root name of the selected object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所選取物件的根名稱。

trans-unit.source: The root name of the selected object.
trans-unit.target: 所選物件的根名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to serialize read only types.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否要序列化唯讀型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to serialize read only types; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 表示序列化唯讀型別，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use a simple dictionary format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否要使用簡單的字典格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to use a simple dictionary format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 表示使用一個簡單的字典格式，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
